differential_diagnoses: Medial meniscal irritation (less likely—no joint-line tenderness, negative McMurray)
clinical_reasoning: Acute valgus mechanism with medial tenderness and pain on valgus stress at 30° without laxity.
ROM near full; stability preserved; other ligament tests negative.
prognosis: Good; expected return to non-contact drills in 1–2 weeks and full play by ~3–4 weeks if criteria met.
